## Source: ossf-package-analysis (1547bbe0cf01cf41ff72ad9faaa2bdb33e76822f001f76cead7cfb34eb0bb6fb)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@frontend-clients/core' @ 10.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
